item.title: Processing UK 2021 census open data with python tools
item.description: Introduction The census provides a rich set of demographic information that could be useful for various data science tasks, such as geomarketing, house price analysis etc. With the results of the 2021 census being published recently, this notebook demonstrates how to manipulate this data with FOSS python tools to build a dataset that can be used for downstream tasks. For this demo, I will be focusing on output areas (OA) of London:
